Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, this product stands out as a top choice in its category. I believe it could significantly enhance your experience and productivity. For a limited time, I am offering you the opportunity to own this exceptional item at an exclusive price of $100. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your routine with superior quality at a fantastic value. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with your purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
